title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 607.6 - Joint projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 607.6 - Joint projects

State Regulations

In the case of a joint project where two or more adjoining
counties have established a project in a watershed common to the counties, each
county of the State participating therein shall be entitled to claim for and
receive State aid in accordance with the pro rata share of the liabilities or
expenditures incurred or undertaken by said county. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
607.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
